'''1. Verify Client Account fields'''

'''Steps:'''

 * Go to the UAT URL
 * Login with a userID in the correct TAM group
 * Go to Static / Menu Account tree item
 * Put some actual value in Client Search field
 * Click on first row in search result table

'''Expected:'''

 * Client Account page opened
 * Client Account parameters (fields) are actual
